page.title: 10A day in my life
page.content: I wake up in my warm bed wrapped in my duvet.I get dressed and go downstairs to the kitchen and make breakfast for my Bampi.We have Shredded Wheat.Then Lisa, my sister, and I brush our teeth,get our satchels and look for the school taxi. At school we sing and say our prayers.I do my work and afterwards I go out to play with the other children. When school is over I go home on the taxi and water my plants.Then I go inside my den.On Thursdays we wait for Mum to come home from shopping. After supper we watch television then get undressed ready for bed.When we are in bed we have a story before we go to sleep.
